net.kuujo.vertigo.util.serializer

Interface JsonSerializable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ComponentConfig<T>, ComponentContext<T>, ComponentHook, Config<T>, ConnectionConfig, ConnectionConfig.Source, ConnectionConfig.Target, ConnectionContext<T>, Context<T>, Hook, InputConnectionContext, InputContext, InputHook, InputPortContext, InstanceContext, IOContext<T>, IOHook, ModuleConfig, ModuleContext, NetworkConfig, NetworkContext, OutputConnectionContext, OutputContext, OutputHook, OutputPortContext, OutputStreamContext, PortContext<T>, Selector, VerticleConfig, VerticleContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllSelector, CustomSelector, EventBusHook, FairSelector, HashSelector, MapEvent, MetricsHook, RandomSelector, RoundRobinSelector

    public interface JsonSerializable
    Interface for serializable objects.

    This interface should be implemented by any classes whose objects should be serializable by Vertigo's internal serialization. In most cases, classes need only implement this interface to make objects serializable. Vertigo will automaticaly detect primitives, primitive wrappers, collections, and other serializable fields within the class to serialize. To implement more advanced serialization features see the Jackson annotations documentation or provide a custom serializer.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
